name: SynchronizationComponent
desc: A component that synchronizes an entity between processes and networked applications.

items.name: var identifier: UInt64
items.desc: A unique identifier of an entity within a network session.

items.name: var isOwner: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the calling process owns the entity.

items.name: enum SynchronizationComponent.OwnershipTransferCompletionResult
items.desc: The result of an ownership transfer request.

items.name: static func == (SynchronizationComponent, SynchronizationComponent) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two synchronization components are equal.

items.name: static func != (SynchronizationComponent, SynchronizationComponent) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two synchronization components are not equal.
